examples.korean: She always has an aura of confidence. 발음듣기 그녀는 항상 자신감이 있어 보인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She always has an aura of confidence. 발음

examples.korean: He feels more confident on home turf. 발음듣기 그는 홈그라운드에 있을 때 더 자신감을 느낀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He feels more confident on home turf. 발음

examples.korean: She walked into the party oozing confidence. 발음듣기 그녀는 자신감을 내뿜으며 파티장으로 걸어 들어왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She walked into the party oozing confidence. 발음

examples.korean: It seemed that nothing could dent his confidence. 발음듣기 그 무엇도 그의 자신감을 꺾지는 못할 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It seemed that nothing could dent his confidence. 발음

examples.korean: Self-doubt began to gnaw away at her confidence. 발음듣기 자기 회의가 그녀의 자신감을 갉아먹기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Self-doubt began to gnaw away at her confidence. 발음
